snippet.sync_client:
from seed.client import SeedRoot

client = SeedRoot(
    base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api",
)
client.echo(
    id="id-ksfd9c1",
    request="Hello world!",
)
snippet.async_client:
from seed.client import AsyncSeedRoot

client = AsyncSeedRoot(
    base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api",
)
await client.echo(
    id="id-ksfd9c1",
    request="Hello world!",
)

snippet.sync_client:
from seed.client import SeedRoot

client = SeedRoot(
    base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api",
)
client.nop(
    id="id-a2ijs82",
    nested_id="id-219xca8",
)
snippet.async_client:
from seed.client import AsyncSeedRoot

client = AsyncSeedRoot(
    base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api",
)
await client.nop(
    id="id-a2ijs82",
    nested_id="id-219xca8",
)
